sec.p: Across the two growing seasons, there were significant differences in leaf length and width between treatments for Dr. octopetala var. asiatica ( Figure 3). Warming increased the leaf length by 29.4% in 2016 and 20.0% in 2017, and similarly increased leaf width by 20.0% in 2016 and 16.7 % in 2017 for Dr. octopetala var. asiatica. Warming increased the leaf length (+25.0%; p = 0.001) and width (+20.0%; p = 0.044) of V. uliginosum in 2016, but these increases disappeared in 2017. For Rh. confertissimum, warming affected the leaf length (+16%) only ( Figure 3).
